objects.name: Suspicious execution which can be abused to download files
objects.description: Detects a suspicious certreq execution taken from the LOLBAS examples, which can be abused to download (small) files
objects.pattern: [process:command_line MATCHES '^.*\(process\.name : \(\*certreq\.exe or \*CertReq\.exe\) or process\.executable : \(\*certreq\.exe or \*CertReq\.exe\)\) and \(process\.command_line : \(\*-Post\* and \*-config\* and \*http\* and \(\*windows\* or \*Windows\*\) and \*win\.ini\* \)\).*$']
